main event: Multiple oval-shaped and round, bright white unidentified flying objects were observed in New Mexico in 1952.
interesting points: The objects were observed hovering and suddenly accelerating at high speeds before disappearing.
Witnesses included pilots, ground observers, and military personnel from the 1405th Fighter-Interceptor Squadron.
The objects did not fit the description of conventional aircraft and were observed for approximately 10-15 minutes.
No photographic evidence was included in the report.
The sighting occurred on different dates and locations within New Mexico, indicating a potential pattern of activity.
sighted object: multiple oval-shaped and round, bright white unidentified flying objects
